content:
In the power of special operations of the Armed Forces reported the destruction of Russian SCR BUK-M1.

Appropriate videopublishedOn your telegram channel.

The SCA of the Armed Forces stated that the next successful complex work of the SCO units and the calculations of firearms in the reconnaissance and scrutiny groups gave its result.

"The effective combination of intelligence capabilities of SCO and modern means of defeat continues to strike the enemy," the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, Ukrainian forcesThey were struckThe enemy punches and the Buk-M1, the Zoo and the Control Point were destroyed.
title: Ukrainian special forces showed how they destroyed the Russian "beech"
